name: Become a tour guide for a local historical organization.
Volunteer to teach English for Speakers of Other Languages (ESOL).
Coach a sport you love to a youth team.
Good at sewing or knitting? Donate homemade blankets to people in need. Take a look at knit-a-square.com or Project Linus.
Volunteer to give music lessons to people in your community.
Volunteer to run/walk for an event, like Race for the Cure or Relay for Life.
